thread.title: Khloe K makes flight arrangements for `legal hubby` Lamar Odom`s father, kids
thread.title_full: Khloe K makes flight arrangements for `legal hubby` Lamar Odom`s father, kids - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Khloe K makes flight arrangements for `legal hubby` Lamar Odom`s father, kids
text:
*Washington D.C., Oct. 15(ANI): Khloe Kardashian might have separated her paths from Lamar Odom , but legally, she is still his wife and is doing everything she could for her hospitalized former partner.*
Washington D.C., Oct. 15(ANI): Khloe Kardashian might have separated her paths from Lamar Odom, but legally, she is still his wife and is doing everything she could for her hospitalized former partner. The 31-year-old TV personality arranged for the 35-year-old former NBA star's father, Joe Odom, as well as for his two children, Destiny Odom and Lamar Odom Jr. and their mother, Liza Morales, to fly out to Las Vegas, reports E! Online. Kardashian is taking all the medical decisions for Odom, who is in coma after being found unconscious in a Nevada brothel following an apparent drug overdose. The estranged couple filled divorce in July, ending their four year-marriage, but are still legally married. (ANI) Â»
